org.openimaj.image.model

Class FisherImages

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.model.FisherImages
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureExtractor<DoubleFV,FImage>, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteableBinary, WriteableBinary, BatchTrainer<IndependentPair<?,FImage>>

    @Reference(type=Article,
           author={"Belhumeur, Peter N.","Hespanha, Jo\\~{a}o P.","Kriegman, David J."},
           title="Eigenfaces vs. Fisherfaces: Recognition Using Class Specific Linear Projection",
           year="1997",
           journal="IEEE Trans. Pattern Anal. Mach. Intell.",
           pages={"711","","720"},
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/34.598228",
           month="July",
           number="7",
           publisher="IEEE Computer Society",
           volume="19",
           customData={"issn","0162-8828","numpages","10","doi","10.1109/34.598228","acmid","261512","address","Washington, DC, USA","keywords","Appearance-based vision, face recognition, illumination invariance, Fisher\'s linear discriminant."})
public class FisherImages
extends Object
implements BatchTrainer<IndependentPair<?,FImage>>, FeatureExtractor<DoubleFV,FImage>, ReadWriteableBinary
    Implementation of Fisher Images (aka "FisherFaces"). PCA is used to avoid the singular within-class scatter matrix.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
